attributes.action: Award Mr Alan Bates a CBE for his service to the Post Office and Justice
attributes.additional_details: Mr Alan Bates lead the campaign for justice for postmasters and postmistress a campaign fought over many years that is now seen as one of the biggest scandals of our time. His efforts along with many others should be acknowledged at the highest level this country can offer.
attributes.background: Ask the prime minister to urge the king to award an appropriate honour now.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
